abilities.name: Enrage
about: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed

abilities.name: Quake Slam
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.

abilities.name: Bear Rain
about: The minion attacks by falling to the ground, causing an impact that deals damage in an area and kills the minion
